content.rendered:
RHINO 4X4 NUDGE BAR TO SUIT VW AMAROK (2011-2018+)

Rhino 4×4 nudge bar to suit VW Amarok (2011-2018+) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!If you are after a bit of extra protection without the need of a full winch bar then this is for you. As with all of our products this is designed from ground up to fully compliment your vehicles original lines and styling. This will really give your vehicle an amazing look while adding the protection you need from the odd bump.

The Rhino4x4 Bar can be ordered in matte black or stainless steel and comes with a steel protection plate not offered with other brands. Stand out from the crowd with our low mount nudge bar. Suits all models.

Includes:

  • Full mounting kit
  • Steel Protection Plate

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your VW Amarok!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
